text: The Toyota 200 was a NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series race at World Wide Technology Raceway at Gateway. The race has been held each year since 1998 except for 2011, 2012 and 2013. The track closed after the 2010 race, reopened in 2012 under new ownership, and the race returned to the schedule in 2014. ==References== Category:NASCAR
title: Toyota 200 presented by CK Power
